title: auRa eSports Hypanova is looking for a Jungle Player (Dia+)
body:
Hi there everyone,

auRa eSports Hypanova is looking for a Jungler. We are team thats been together for a while now and we've had to make some roster changes, so currently we need a jungler.

We are a team dedicate to working hard in Season 5 both online in ranked 5's play and through tournament play. We ask that you be open minded and process constructive criticism well.

If feel thats you then please fill out the following and leave it in the comments.

IGN:
Age: (17+ Only)
Rank:
Top 4 Champs:
What you want to get out of a team:
What you bring to a team:



Cheers, auRa Chokeville.

replies.body:
IGN: Pooge
Age: 21
Rank: G1
Top 4 Champs: J4, Vi, Pantheon, Lee Sin
What you want to get out of a team: A dedicated group of individuals looking to play regularly and improve as a team.
What you bring to a team: Excellent game knowledge, composure under pressure, drive to compete and improve.

I understand that I am currently Gold 1, however I am extremely confident that I can achieve Diamond+ this season (If you check my Op.GG profile you will see that the top 3 people that I regularly play with are diamond/plat1 so I am regularly playing against diamonds / high plats). If my rank is not something you can overlook I understand your reasoning and hope you have success finding a new player.

I wouldn't be sure about joining this team, your player "aura impulsez" is a toxic player with so much negativity in his ranked games. i've played with him in ranked before and all he does is spam "gg" and proceeds to blame the team. great example of a team player right there lolol
Well I am sorry that you had to experience that but people have bad days and people have bad games. That's all I have to say to that.
